lead_paragraph: A near-record crowd of 105,826 saw Real Madrid score three first-half goals and hang on for a 3-2 win against Chelsea in a friendly at Michigan Stadium on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Over 105,000 Watch Real Madrid Beat Chelsea in Michigan
headline.main: Over 105,000 Watch Real Madrid Beat Chelsea in Michigan

snippet: A near-record crowd of 105,826 saw Real Madrid score three first-half goals and hang on for a 3-2 win against Chelsea in a friendly at Michigan Stadium on Saturday....
